summary: Base interfaces and dataclasses for TTS adapters.

top_level_symbols.name: SynthesisError
top_level_symbols.doc: Raised when a TTS engine fails to synthesize audio.

top_level_symbols.name: TTSTask
top_level_symbols.doc:
A single text-to-speech synthesis job. Attributes:
    text: Text content to synthesize (plain text; pre-normalized).

top_level_symbols.name: TTSAdapter
top_level_symbols.doc: Abstract base class for all TTS engine adapters. Subclasses must implement :meth:`preload` and :meth:`synth`.
